title: BBC Local Live: Cambridgeshire on Friday, 18 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: emergency services in cambridge and peterborough get ready to deal with drinkers on `` black eye friday '' , the busiest drinking night of the year .
cambridgeshire county council says it 's disappointed with latest funding from government .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: that 's it from cambridgeshire live
text: that 's all from the cambridgeshire live team for this week .
we 'll be be back on monday from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , travel and weather in the county .
you can send us your stories and

documents.title: weather : cloudy and very mild
text: it 'll be cloudy and very mild tonight with most places staying dry .
minimum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
tomorrow most places will be dry with a good deal of cloud , but with some sunny spells .
it will be windy , but exceptionally mild and remaining dry overnight .
for a more detailed forecast for where you live , head to bbc weather .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: young photographer praised in unicef competition
text: the work of a young photographer from cambridge has been praised at the unicef photo of the year awards .
the prize recognises photos that de the personality and living conditions of children around the world .
megan lovell , a student on the photography course at anglia ruskin university , was the only british photographer to make the shortlist for the annual prize .
author: Katharine Park
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: headlines : emergency services prepare to deal with drinkers on 'black eye friday ' weapons attack advice issued
text: here are the top stories for cambridgeshire :
author: Kerry Devine
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: picture : more evidence of spring in the air
text: it 's ( not ) beginning to look a lot like christmas , with yet more evidence that spring is in the air captured in this by bbc weather watcher `` bedlam 49 '' in sawtry .
snowdrops , daffodils and even blossom have appeared weeks early in cambridgeshire because of the mild weather .
forecasters say this year 's strong el nino weather phenomenon is thought to be behind the influx of warm air .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : two lanes closed on the a14 westbound at bar hill following crash
text: a crash involving three vehicles had closed two lanes on the a14 westbound near bar hill .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: cambridge academic 's moving christmas letters home from german pow camp published for first time
text: moving christmas letters written by a british prisoner of war held in a notorious german camp during world war two are to be published for the first time .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: do not be 'alarmed ' say police after issuing weapons attack video
text: cambridgeshire police says people should not be `` alarmed '' after the force issued a video outlining what to do in the event of a weapons attack .
assistant chief constable andy said : the public should not be alarmed by this step .
`` while the general level of threat to the uk is severe , the probability of being caught up in a firearms or weapons attack is very , very small . ''
author: Katharine Park
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: video : tackling congestion in cambridge
text: the pros and cons of making cyclists pay a possible congestion charge in cambridge , have been discussed at a meeting in the city , filmed by political blogger richard taylor .
members of the greater cambridge city deal joint assembly were discussing how to tackle traffic problems .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: family completes shackleton 's abandoned south pole trek
text: relatives of a scientist on sir ernest shackleton 's ill-fated antarctica expedition in 1915 have reached the south pole 100 years later .
the trip was conceived by tim holmes and his wife , alice , who is wordie 's granddaughter , from cambridge .
author: Kerry Devine
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: ambulance 'twitterthon ' : service recieves 164 calls
text: the east of england ambulance service is revealing revealed details of emergency calls it has received from cambridgeshire today .
the service is providing insights into its work in a 24-hour `` twitterthon '' .
dispatcher ashley is sending an ambulance to an elderly diabetic in chatteris with low blood sugar levels # 24hoursineoe
another gp call has come in for an urgent transfer of an elderly patient in peterborough to hospital # 24hoursineoe
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : police issue weapons attack advice peterborough charity delivers aid to cumbria flood victims
text: here are the top stories in cambridgeshire this afternoon :
author: Kerry Devine
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: peterborough charity delivers aid to cumbria flood victims
text: members of a peterborough muslim charity have delivered supplies to people affected by the recent floods in cumbria .
the sons of adam was set up by four friends from peterborough 's pakistani community three years ago to help the homeless and those in need .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: video : cambridgeshire police issue weapons attack safety advice
text: an information film providing advice on how to react in the event of a firearms or weapons attack has been issued by cambridgeshire police .
assistant chief constable andy hebb said : `` it is only with the ongoing support of communities that we can defeat terrorism - you are our eyes and ears so please be alert , but not alarmed '' .
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: deep fat fryer causes peterborough bowling alley fire
text: a deep fat fryer led to a fire at a bowling alley in peterborough .
author: Peterborough Telegraph

documents.title: weather : remaining mild , but cloudy this afternoon
text: it 'll remain cloudy through this afternoon , as shown in this of st ives by 'rugby dave ' on the bbc weather watchers page .
it will also be very mild for the time of year .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
for a more detailed forecast for where you live , head to bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: cambridge residents 'left in dark ' over future of tivoli pub after fire nine months ago
text: people in cambridge have been left in the dark over the future of a pub which caught fire in march , it has been said .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: government funding to be cut by 40 % says council
text: south cambridgeshire district council says the money it receives from central government will be cut by more than 40 % .
a spokesman says the settlement also confirms grant funding will be cut completely by 2018 .
the council has established new income generating businesses , such as a housing company , to try plug the gap .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: black eye friday : former bouncer says he never used to see much trouble
text: a former cambridge bouncer who spent more than 30 years on doors in the city says he never used to experience a lot of trouble .
emergency services in the city are getting ready for `` black eye friday '' - the biggest drinking night of the year .
peter day from hardwick told bbc radio cambridgeshire : `` i can remember when it was heaving with people but there was not one ounce of trouble '' .
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: headline : cambridge care facility prepared for drunk revellers council says government funding faces 40 % cut
text: here are the top stories in cambridgeshire so far this morning :

documents.title: ambulance service 'twitterthon ' : 159 calls recieved in last hour
text: the east of england ambulance service says it has received 159 calls across the six counties it covers in the last hour .
the service is carrying out a `` twitterthon '' , highlighting the calls it responds to over 24 hours .
10am to 11am : hour four saw us take 159 calls across all our six counties .
62 of those were taken by our # chelmsford team # 24hoursineoe
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: world cycle ride fundraiser callum keeps promise to be back home for christmas
text: callum fairhurst has taken time out from a global cycling challenge to keep a promise to be back for christmas .
the 18 year old from soham embarked on the challenge in sydney in july , to raise money in memory of his brother liam , who lost his fight against cancer aged 10 .
callum is back briefly to keep a promise to his mum to spend christmas at home .

documents.title: cambridge united : shaun derry says he wo n't let standards slip
text: manager shaun derry says wo n't allow standards to slip when cambridge united play host to mansfield in league two tomorrow .
the u 's have won three and lost three of their six matches since 38-year-old derry replaced richard money at the league two club .
author: Nick Fairbairn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire sport

documents.title: black eye friday warning issued as police and army take to cambridge streets
text: a 'black eye friday ' warning has been issued for cambridge city centre tonight as the army moves in and the police take to the streets to quell festive fight nights .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: council 'disappointed ' with new funding from government
text: cambridgeshire county council says it is disappointed in the funding settlement it 's received from the government - even though it is getting an extra £ 10 million over the next five years .
the council says that overall the grant it gets from government could actually reduce by 40-50 % by 2019 , when the rising cost of supplying services is taken into account .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cambridge 'safety refuge ' for revellers set up by police
text: all quiet in cambridge city centre at the moment , but later on police will be setting up a `` safety refuge '' here for revellers who have overdone it on the alcohol .
emergency services are expecting the busiest drinking night of the year , which has become known as `` black eye friday '' .
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: duke and duchess of cambridge release christmas family portrait
text: the duke and duchess of cambridge have used social media to release a new family portrait for christmas today .
a new family photo - merry christmas from the duke and duchess of cambridge , prince george and princess charlotte
@ twitterid such a beautiful family x

author: Katharine Park
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: peterborough city council agrees £ 12m of budget savings but tough decisions lie ahead
text: peterborough city council has agreed £ 12 million of savings to tackle its large budget deficit for 2016/17 , although another £ 7.5 million is still left to be found amid fears that popular services could yet be affected .
author: Peterborough Telegraph

documents.title: weather : a bright start , becoming cloudy later
text: it 'll be a bright to start the day , with sunny spells for most .
cloud will start to build in from the west during the afternoon , but it should stay dry , and feeling very mild .
top temperature : 13 c ( 55 f ) .
for a more detailed forecast for where you live , head to bbc weather .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: east of england ambulance service begins 24 hour 'twitterthon '
text: the east of england of england ambulance service has started a live `` twitterthon '' , highlighting the calls it responds to over 24 hours .
it coincides with the busiest drinking night of the year , which has been termed `` black eye friday '' .
7.00 - 8.00am : we 've taken 97 calls across the region in the 1st hour of # 24hoursineoe .
33 of those calls were taken at our # chelmsford eoc .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : emergency services prepare for 'black eye friday , ' busiest drinking night of the year
text: here are the top stories in cambridgeshire this morning :
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: travel : one lane blocked westbound on the a14 near cambridge services
text: one lane on the a14 is blocked westbound following a crash near cambridge services .
# a14 westtbound between j29 ( bar hill ) and j28 ( swavesey ) partially blocked due to an accident .
expect delays .
@ cambs traffic # crashnotaccident : - )
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: welcome to cambridgeshire live on friday
text: good morning from the cambridgeshire live team !
we 'll be be here until 18:00 with the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates from across the county .
you can send us your stories and
travel news is on the way
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live
